alert.note: Alert for Bath (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 10:46AM EST until January 09 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Virginia, Bath County. In West Virginia, Eastern Greenbrier County. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please report ice accumulations via email at rnk.skywarn@noaa.gov or by calling the National Weather Service toll free at...1...866...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Leave a message with your observation and the specific location where it occurred. You can also post your report to National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
